 38
 39// Return the subdomain of a view/map pair for a subblock.
 40
 41template <typename ViewT>
 42inline Domain<ViewT::dim>
 43subblock_domain(
 44  ViewT const&        view,
 45  Local_map const&    /*map*/,
 46  index_type          sb)
 47{
 48  assert(sb == 0 || sb == no_subblock);
 49  return (sb == 0) ? block_domain<ViewT::dim>(view.block())
 50                   : empty_domain<ViewT::dim>();
 51}
 52
 53template <typename ViewT,
 54	  typename MapT>
 55inline Domain<ViewT::dim>
 56subblock_domain(
 57  ViewT const&     /*view*/,
 58  MapT const&      map,
 59  index_type       sb)
 60{
 61  return map.template impl_subblock_domain<ViewT::dim>(sb);
 62}
 63
 64
 65
 66// Return the local domain of a view/map pair for a subblock/patch.
 67
 68template <typename ViewT>
 69inline Domain<ViewT::dim>
 70local_domain(
 71  ViewT const& view,
 72  Local_map const&    /*map*/,
 73  index_type          sb,
 74  index_type          p)
 75{
 76  assert((sb == 0 && p == 0) || sb == no_subblock);
 77  return (sb == 0) ? block_domain<ViewT::dim>(view.block())
 78                   : empty_domain<ViewT::dim>();
 79}
 80
 81template <typename ViewT,
 82	  typename MapT>
 83inline Domain<ViewT::dim>
 84local_domain(
 85  ViewT const&     /*view*/,
 86  MapT const&      map,
 87  index_type       sb,
 88  index_type       p)
 89{
 90  return map.template impl_local_domain<ViewT::dim>(sb, p);
 91}
 92
 93
 94
 95// Return the global domain of a view/map pair for a subblock/patch.
 96
 97template <typename ViewT>
 98inline Domain<ViewT::dim>
 99global_domain(
100  ViewT const& view,
101  Local_map const&    /*map*/,
102  index_type          sb,
103  index_type          p)
104{
105  assert((sb == 0 && p == 0) || sb == no_subblock);
106  return (sb == 0) ? block_domain<ViewT::dim>(view.block())
107                   : empty_domain<ViewT::dim>();
108}
109
110template <typename ViewT,
111	  typename MapT>
112inline Domain<ViewT::dim>
113global_domain(
114  ViewT const&     /*view*/,
115  MapT const&      map,
116  index_type       sb,
117  index_type       p)
118{
119  return map.template impl_global_domain<ViewT::dim>(sb, p);
120}
121
122} // namespace vsip::impl::psf_detail
123} // namespace vsip::impl

127/***********************************************************************
128  Definitions - [view.support.fcn] parallel support functions
129***********************************************************************/
130
131/// Return the domain of VIEW's subblock SB.
132
133/// Requires
134///   VIEW to be a view
135///   SB to either be a valid subblock of VIEW, or the value no_subblock.
136///
137/// Returns
138///   The domain of VIEW's subblock SB if SB is valid, the empty
139///   domain if SB == no_subblock.
140
141template <typename ViewT>
142Domain<ViewT::dim>
143subblock_domain(
144  ViewT const&  view,
145  index_type    sb)
146{
147  return impl::psf_detail::subblock_domain(view, view.block().map(), sb);
148}
149
150
151
152/// Return the domain of VIEW's subblock held by the local processor.
153
154/// Requires
155///   VIEW to be a view
156///
157/// Returns
158///   The domain of VIEW's subblock held by the local processor.
159
160template <typename ViewT>
161Domain<ViewT::dim>
162subblock_domain(
163  ViewT const&  view)
164{
165  return impl::psf_detail::subblock_domain(view, view.block().map(),
166					   view.block().map().subblock());
167}
168
169
170
171/// Return the local domain of VIEW's subblock SB patch P
172
173/// Requires
174///   VIEW to be a view
175///   SB to either be a valid subblock of VIEW, or the value no_subblock.
176///   P to either be a valid patch of subblock SB.
177///
178/// Returns
179///   The local domain of VIEW's subblock SB patch P if SB is valid,
180///   the empty domain if SB == no_subblock.
181
182template <typename ViewT>
183Domain<ViewT::dim>
184local_domain(
185  ViewT const&  view,
186  index_type    sb,
187  index_type    p)
188{
189  return impl::psf_detail::local_domain(view, view.block().map(), sb, p);
190}
191
192
193
194/// Return the local domain of VIEW's patch P on the local processor's subblock
195
196/// Requires
197///   VIEW to be a view
198///   P to either be a valid patch of the local processor's subblock.
199///
200/// Returns
201///   The local domain of VIEW's patch P of the local processor's subblock
202///     if the local processor holds a subblock,
203///   The empty domain otherwise.
204
205template <typename ViewT>
206Domain<ViewT::dim>
207local_domain(
208  ViewT const&  view,
209  index_type    p=0)
210{
211  return impl::psf_detail::local_domain(view, view.block().map(),
212					view.block().map().subblock(),
213					p);
214}
215
216
217
218/// Return the global domain of VIEW's subblock SB patch P
219
220/// Requires
221///   VIEW to be a view
222///   SB to either be a valid subblock of VIEW, or the value no_subblock.
223///   P to either be a valid patch of subblock SB.
224///
225/// Returns
226///   The global domain of VIEW's subblock SB patch P if SB is valid,
227///   the empty domain if SB == no_subblock.
228
229template <typename ViewT>
230Domain<ViewT::dim>
231global_domain(
232  ViewT const&  view,
233  index_type    sb,
234  index_type    p)
235{
236  return impl::psf_detail::global_domain(view, view.block().map(), sb, p);
237}
238
239
240
241/// Return the global domain of VIEW's local subblock patch P
242
243/// Requires
244///   VIEW to be a view
245///   P to either be a valid patch of the local processor's subblock.
246///
247/// Returns
248///   The global domain of VIEW's patch P of the local processor's subblock
249///     if the local processor holds a subblock,
250///   The empty domain otherwise.
251
252template <typename ViewT>
253Domain<ViewT::dim>
254global_domain(
255  ViewT const&  view,
256  index_type    p=0)
257{
258  return impl::psf_detail::global_domain(view, view.block().map(), 
259					 view.block().map().subblock(),
260					 p);
261}
262
263
264/// Return the number of subblocks VIEW is distrubted over.
265
266/// Requires
267///   VIEW to be a view
268
269template <typename ViewT>
270length_type
271num_subblocks(
272  ViewT const&  view)
273{
274  return view.block().map().num_subblocks();
275}
276
277
278
279/// Return the number of patches in VIEW's subblock SB.
280
281/// Requires
282///   VIEW to be a view.
283///   SB to either be a valid subblock of VIEW, or the value no_subblock.
284
285template <typename ViewT>
286length_type
287num_patches(
288  ViewT const&  view,
289  index_type    sb)
290{
291  return view.block().map().impl_num_patches(sb);
292}
293
294
295
296/// Return the number of patches in VIEW's subblock held on the local
297/// processor.
298
299/// Requires
300///   VIEW to be a view.
301
302template <typename ViewT>
303length_type
304num_patches(
305  ViewT const&  view)
306{
307  return view.block().map().impl_num_patches(view.block().map().subblock());
308}
309
310
311
312/// Return the subblock rank held by processor PR.
313
314/// Requires
315///   VIEW to be a view.
316///   PR to be processor.
317///
318/// Returns
319///   The subblock rank of VIEW held by processor PR if it holds a subblock,
320///   NO_SUBBLOCK otherwise.
321
322template <typename ViewT>
323index_type
324subblock(
325  ViewT const&   view,
326  processor_type pr)
327{
328  return view.block().map().subblock(pr);
329}
330
331
332
333/// Return the subblock rank held by processor PR.
334
335/// Requires
336///   VIEW to be a view.
337///
338/// Returns
339///   The subblock rank of VIEW held by local processor,
340///   or NO_SUBBLOCK if it does not hold a subblock.
341
342template <typename ViewT>
343index_type
344subblock(
345  ViewT const&   view)
346{
347  return view.block().map().subblock();
348}
349
350
351
352/// Determine which subblock holds VIEW's global index IDX
353
354template <typename ViewT>
355index_type
356subblock_from_global_index(
357  ViewT const&             view,
358  Index<ViewT::dim> const& idx)
359{
360  for (dimension_type d=0; d<ViewT::dim; ++d)
361    assert(idx[d] < view.size(d));
362
363  return view.block().
364    map().template impl_subblock_from_global_index<ViewT::dim>(idx);
365}
366
367
368
369/// Determine which patch holds VIEW's global index IDX
370
371/// Notes:
372///   This patch is only valid in the subblock returned by
373///   subblock_from_global_index.
374
375template <typename ViewT>
376index_type
377patch_from_global_index(
378  ViewT const&             view,
379  Index<ViewT::dim> const& idx)
380{
381  for (dimension_type d=0; d<ViewT::dim; ++d)
382    assert(idx[d] < view.size(d));
383
384  return view.block().
385    map().template impl_subblock_from_global_index<ViewT::dim>(idx);
386}
387
388
389
390/***********************************************************************
391  local_from_global_index
392***********************************************************************/
393
394/// Determine the local index corresponding to VIEW's global index G_IDX.
395
396/// Notes:
397///   This local index is only valid in processors hold the subblock
398///   returned by subblock_from_global_index.
399
400template <typename ViewT>
401Index<ViewT::dim>
402local_from_global_index(
403  ViewT const&             view,
404  Index<ViewT::dim> const& g_idx)
405VSIP_NOTHROW
406{
407  Index<ViewT::dim> l_idx;
408
409  for (dimension_type d=0; d<ViewT::dim; ++d)
410    l_idx[d] = local_from_global_index(view, d, g_idx[d]);
411
412  return l_idx;
413}
414
415
416
417/// Determine the local index corresponding to VIEW's global index
418/// G_IDX for dimension DIM.
419
420template <typename ViewT>
421index_type
422local_from_global_index(
423  ViewT const&             view,
424  dimension_type           dim,
425  index_type               g_idx)
426VSIP_NOTHROW
427{
428  return view.block().map().impl_local_from_global_index(dim, g_idx);
429}
430
431
432
433/***********************************************************************
434  global_from_local_index
435***********************************************************************/
436/// Determine BLOCKS's global index corresponding to local index L_IDX
437
438template <typename Block, dimension_type Dim>
439inline
440Index<Dim>
441global_from_local_index_blk(
442  Block const&             b,
443  Index<Dim> const& l_idx)
444{
445  Index<Dim> g_idx;
446
447  for (dimension_type d=0; d<Dim; ++d)
448    g_idx[d] = 
449      b.map().impl_global_from_local_index(d, b.map().subblock(), l_idx[d]);
450
451  return g_idx;
452}
453
454
455/// Determine VIEW's global index corresponding to local index L_IDX
456/// of subblock SB.
457
458template <typename ViewT>
459inline
460Index<ViewT::dim>
461global_from_local_index(
462  ViewT const&             view,
463  index_type               sb,
464  Index<ViewT::dim> const& l_idx)
465{
466  Index<ViewT::dim> g_idx;
467
468  for (dimension_type d=0; d<ViewT::dim; ++d)
469    g_idx[d] = global_from_local_index(view, d, sb, l_idx[d]);
470
471  return g_idx;
472}
473
474
475
476/// Determine VIEW's global index corresponding to local index L_IDX
477/// of the subblock held on the local processor.
478
479template <typename ViewT>
480inline
481Index<ViewT::dim>
482global_from_local_index(
483  ViewT const&             view,
484  Index<ViewT::dim> const& l_idx)
485{
486  Index<ViewT::dim> g_idx;
487
488  for (dimension_type d=0; d<ViewT::dim; ++d)
489    g_idx[d] = global_from_local_index(view, d, l_idx[d]);
490
491  return g_idx;
492}
493
494
495
496/// Determine VIEW's global index corresponding to local index L_IDX
497/// for dimension DIM of subblock SB.
498
499template <typename ViewT>
500inline
501index_type
502global_from_local_index(
503  ViewT const&   view,
504  dimension_type dim,
505  index_type     sb,
506  index_type     l_idx)
507{
508  return view.block().map().impl_global_from_local_index(dim, sb, l_idx);
509}
510
511
512
513/// Determine VIEW's global index corresponding to local index L_IDX
514/// for dimension DIM of the subblock held on the local processor.
515
516template <typename ViewT>
517inline
518index_type
519global_from_local_index(
520  ViewT const&   view,
521  dimension_type dim,
522  index_type     l_idx)
523{
524  index_type sb = view.block().map().subblock();
525
526  if (sb != no_subblock)
527    return view.block().map().impl_global_from_local_index(dim, sb, l_idx);
528  else
529    return no_index;
530}
